text: For the paranormal investigator, see Ryan Buell. Ryan W. Buell is an American academic. He is the UPS Foundation Associate Professor of Service Management at the Harvard Business School. He has published research on economic redistribution and service management. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Ross School of Business alumni Category:Harvard Business School alumni Category:Harvard Business School faculty Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Ryan W. Buell
